data.title: Double Date with Marlo Thomas & Phil Donahue
data.meta_description: Before they met, Neil and David were two hot young actors often up for the same gigs. With love, determination and laughs, they’ve long since made sure that jealousy (professional and romantic) is the only thing unwelcome in the gorgeous Harlem brownstone they share with their two children.
